item.title: Fauci Refuses To Take Media Questions At Protested Florida Speaking Event

item.title: Ridicule Is The Final Frontier For The Ladies Of Blue Origin
item.description: Katy Perry, Lauren Sanchez and Gayle King, pretended to be astronauts and corporate media pretended their brief trek was news.

item.title: At Coachella As In The Real World, Privileged Leftists Pretend To Be Counter-Cultural
item.description: The dramatic excessiveness of Coachella makes the appearance of Sen. Bernie Sanders all the more ironic.

item.title: Last Of Us Season Premiere Punctures The Obnoxious Girlboss Trope
item.description: The new season of 'The Last of Us' doesn’t coddle or lionize teenage girls but instead depicts them in all their obnoxious glory.

item.title: To Think Bigger About Catholic Education, Start Thinking Smaller
item.description: The parish school is not the only way to deliver Catholic education, just as an assigned public school is not the only way to deliver non-Catholic edu...
